item.title: Golden Girls, Really?
item.description: First off, this. Nostalgia community, we need to have a deep and confronting conversation. Itâ€™s time to stop pretending you like The Golden Girls. Nobody but your grandma liked The Golden Girls, and thatâ€™s exactly as it should be. Your unnatural determination to make The Golden Girls a â€œthingâ€ amongst thirty-something males has led to this abomination, and itâ€™s time we as a society put an end to this madness.
